title: Jada Pinkett Smith credits Oprah Winfrey with red table talk success
text:
Jada Pinkett Smith credits Oprah Winfrey with making her show Red Table Talk possible.

The actress launched her Facebook Watch series in 2018 where she stars alongside her mother Adrienne Banfield-Jones and Willow Smith as well as a host of special guests.

And she's said that it's thanks to her mentor Oprah Winfrey that she was able to get the show up and running.

Posting a picture of herself and Oprah during a red carpet event on her Instagram, Jada says Oprah is the only reason the show could even be imagined.

Compiled by Phelokazi Mbude

description: Jada Pinkett Smith credits Oprah Winfrey with making her show Red Table Talk possible.
